description: Demo sign index with 100 common signs for hackathon

HELLO.description: Wave hand at forehead level, palm facing out

GOODBYE.description: Wave hand downward in farewell gesture

YES.description: Fist nods up and down like nodding head

NO.description: Index and middle finger tap thumb

LIKE.description: Middle finger and thumb on chest, pull away

LOVE.description: Cross arms over chest in hug

HAPPY.description: Flat hands brush upward on chest repeatedly

SAD.description: Open hands move down in front of face

ANGRY.description: Claw hand in front of face, pull down

UNDERSTAND.description: Index finger flicks up near temple

REMEMBER.description: Thumb touches forehead then thumb of other hand

FORGET.description: Hand wipes across forehead and opens

THEY.description: Point and sweep to indicate group

WE.description: Index finger arcs from shoulder to shoulder

WHAT.description: Palms up, shake slightly back and forth

WHERE.description: Index finger shakes side to side

WHY.description: Touch forehead, pull away into Y handshape

EAT.description: Flat O hand moves to mouth

DRINK.description: C hand moves to mouth like holding cup

SLEEP.description: 5-hand closes to flat O while lowering from face

WORK.description: S hands tap together at wrists

LEARN.description: Grab from palm and move to forehead

TEACH.description: Flat O hands move forward from temples

STOP.description: Flat hand chops down onto palm

GIVE.description: Flat O hands move forward and open

SAY.description: Index finger circles outward from chin

TELL.description: Index finger moves forward from chin

ASK.description: Index fingers form question mark motion

GOOD.description: Flat hand from chin moves down to palm

BAD.description: Flat hand from chin flips down palm down

SLOW.description: Hand slowly slides up back of other hand

HOME.description: Flat O touches corner of mouth then cheek

HOSPITAL.description: H-hand draws cross on upper arm

BOOK.description: Palms together open like a book

CAR.description: Fists move like steering a wheel

TIME.description: Index finger taps back of wrist

LATER.description: L-hand thumb on palm rotates forward

BEFORE.description: Flat hand moves back toward body from in front of other hand

AFTER.description: Flat hand moves forward from behind other hand

TOMORROW.description: A-hand thumb touches cheek and arcs forward

YESTERDAY.description: A-hand thumb touches chin then cheek

AGAIN.description: Bent hand arcs up and touches palm

ALWAYS.description: Index finger makes circles in the air

NEVER.description: Flat hand sweeps down in S-shape

DEAF.description: Index finger touches ear then corner of mouth

SIGN.description: Index fingers alternate pointing and circling

PRACTICE.description: A-hand brushes back and forth on index finger
